author: Morgan Gstalter
title: Twitter donating $1M to journalism nonprofits amid coronavirus crisis
description: Twitter announced on Tuesday that it was donating $1 million to journalism nonprofits to support reporters during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.The social media network...
content:
Twitter announced on Tuesday that it was donating $1 million to journalism nonprofits to support reporters during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
The social media network wrote in a statement that it would distribute the funds evenly between the Committee … [+2509 chars]
